Title: Achari America Yathra
Writer: Venkata Krishna Murthi Malladi (story), G. Nageswara Reddy (screenplay), Darling Swamy
Actors: Master Bharath, Brahmanandam, Kateryna Dronova, Pragya Jaiswal
Plot: Achari tricks his Guru into taking a group trip to the US to pursue his dream girl, whom he met in India.
